sentences.sentence: Short pruning ( double guyot ) ; weeding a year , hand - picking with double sorting.
sentences.translation: 种植方式： 单臂篱架，短梢修剪； 隔行留草， 手工精选采收。

sentences.sentence: Vineyard: selected grapes cultivated at between 300 and 400 metres above sea level trained by the Guyot system on clay soil.
sentences.translation: 葡萄园：葡萄种植在海拔300 - 400米的平顶山区地带，其土质为粘性土壤。
